sense.def:
A hook
je zakrivljen kos kovine ali plastike, ki ga uporabimo za obešanje predmetov.

seg.quote: Howard hangs up his coat on the hook behind the door.

sense.def:
To hook one thing onto another
pomeni pripeti eno stvar na drugo s kavljem.

seg.quote: One after the other they were hooked to the moving cable.

sense.def:
Če telefonsko slušalko vzamemo
off the hook
, jo vzamemo s stojala, na katerem navadno stoji, tako da telefon ne more zvoniti.

To get off the hook
pomeni rešiti se iz težavnega ali nevarnega položaja;

seg.quote: He felt he had got off the hook perhaps too easily.

sense.def:
To hook up a computer or other electronic machine
pomeni povezati računalnik ali kak drug kos elektronske opreme z osrednjim virom energije.
